extensionDescription.message: Strelloids - Trello possibilities expander. Custom tags, colored lists, hiding the lists, scrum points, new views and much more.

module_cardsSeparator_description.message: To make separator, start card title with three or more characters: - or = (eg. "--- My separator"

module_customTags_description.message: To make tag, put their name inside square brackets into card title (eg. "[tag name]")

module_scrumTime_description.message: To add estimation points for card, put it into round brackets (eg. "(3)", "(0.5)", "(?)"). To set consumption points, put it into square brackets (eg. "[5]", "[2.5]").
